TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VoiceChangeEventArgs extends System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当对象引发<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs> 事件 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> 时，将创建的实例。 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> 若要获取新<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>的标识，请访问事件处理程序中的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A>属性。
您可以使用的任何<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>方法或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>或方法来更改所使用的语音。 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Voice As VoiceInfo
public: property System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceInfo ^ Voice { System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceInfo ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 获取新语言的 对象。
Docs.value: 返回描述和标识新语音的信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>引发事件 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> 时，属性将获取该对象。
